plot: PP-LiteSeg: A Superior Real-Time Semantic Segmentation Model
summary: Real-world applications have high demands for semantic segmentation methods. PP-LiteSeg achieves a superior trade-off between accuracy and speed compared to other methods. On the Cityscapes test set, PaddleSeg achieves 72.0% mIoU/273.6 FPS on NVIDIA GTX 1080Ti. Source code and models are available at PaddSeg: this https URL. Source code is available at the PaddestSeg website: http://://://www.paddleSeg.org/.
